title: Looking for alternative to Bickham Script
content: hopefully something chalk full of glyphs as well :)
author: Cris B

comments.content: Ale Paul's [Burgues Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155602/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267) and [Compendium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155602/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000365) are two of my favorites.
Have Burgues. Never heard of Compendium. Very nice! Much thanks.
